data.title: Contact
data.meta_description: Information on how to contact U.S. Secret Service.
data.text:
Please contact your nearest field office by telephone if you need immediate assistance.

U.S. Secret Service

245 Murray Ln SW - BLDG T-5,

Washington, DC 20223

202-406-5708

Counterfeit notes should NOT be sent to this address.

Secret Service Media Inquiries

If you are a member of the media trying to contact the Secret Service for information, fact checking and official quotes, email usssmediainquiry@usss.dhs.gov

2024 Democratic National Convention Media Inquiries

If you are a member of the media seeking information regarding the 2024 Democratic National Convention, email DNCMedia@cityofchicago.org.

Counterfeit Currency

Please send all counterfeit notes to:

Bureau of Engraving and Printing

c/o CCPF â€“ Room 541A

301 14th Street SW

Washington, DC 20228

Field Offices

Find the nearest U.S. Secret Service Field Office to you.

Connect with the United States Secret Service Today

Your interest in pursuing career opportunities with the Secret Service is important to us. However, please note that time-sensitive or critical information should not be sent via email. Due to the large volume of inquiries we receive, we encourage you to search our site and visit our Frequently Asked Questions page for timely answers to your questions.

Applicants who require further assistance may call 1-888-813-USSS

Deaf and hard of hearing 202-406-5370

Personnel Issues
